content: How can I create an HTML table to display and organize data for multiple students and their respective scores in different subjects?

Creating an HTML table to display and organize data for multiple students and their respective scores in different subjects is straightforward. Below is a basic example to help you get started. This example assumes you have three students and three subjects, but you can expand it as needed: ```html Student Scores

Student Scores
